The summe & substance of Christian religion set downe in a catechisticall way, by H.I. Summe and substance of Christian religion. Isaacson, Henry, 1581-1654.
[2], 94 p.
by W. Wilson, and are to be sold by Richard Thrale at Pauls gate at the signe of the Crosse-keyes, Printed at London : 1647.
An edition of: Isaacson, Henry. "The summe and substance of Christian religion", first published in 1646. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
